resources.string: Guess the full movie title based on the displayed frame.
It is not necessary to enter accents or punctuation marks in the answer.
It doesn\'t matter if the answer is in uppercase or lowercase.
Levels usually have 30 movies. You need to guess 20 movies before advancing to the next level.
The game is automatically saved on your device, this means that if the app data is deleted the progress will be lost.
